Class PathAddressableMenuImpl

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
PathAddressableMenu
public class PathAddressableMenuImpl
extends Object
implements PathAddressableMenu

An implementation of PathAddressableMenu that operates on a given menu element.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a path-adressable menu with a given menu element as its root.
